Titles.jpn: 超変身コス∞プレイヤー

Summaries.eng: Koto unknowingly seals away the Sun Goddess Amaterasu, and now she is in a different world and can't return. Meeting priestesses who combat the evil in this strange place she learns that Black Towers throughout the land keep Amatersu sealed away and are guarded by evil monsters. Koto must now find a way to help defeat these monsters and return the world to the way it was.
Summaries.jpn: “変身3部作”の第1作。「超変身コス∞プレイヤー」が、特撮TV番組という設定で、「ヒットをねらえ！」と「LOVE LOVE？」へと展開する。邪神復活を阻止すべく、世界中から集結した“祈闘師”たち（コスモポリタン・プレイヤーズ）。だが、出雲での封印儀式に失敗し、彼女たち以外の人間は消えてしまった…！

Summaries.eng: ∞5 "Red defeat" An ancient city with a feeling of floating, with consecutive victories continuing from the first victory. Scarlet that severely criticizes such an ancient city. Dissatisfied, the ancient city tries to challenge a new Yao.
Summaries.jpn: ∞5「赤い敗北」初勝利から連勝が続き、浮かれ気分の古都。そんな古都を厳しくいさめるスカーレット。不満を感じた古都は、新たなヤオの者に挑もうとするが…。

Summaries.eng: ∞ 6 "Momo no Hidden Hot Spring" (First Edition) Following Scarlet's advice, an ancient city that heals the pain of defeat at a hot spring inn. A samurai monster attacks the ancient city that has risen from the open-air bath ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞6「桃の秘湯」（初号版）スカーレットの忠告に従い、温泉旅館で敗北の痛みを癒す古都。露天風呂から上がった古都に、武者怪人が襲いかかり…。

Summaries.eng: ∞ 9 "Green Dread" The tower that should have been purified has been revived, and a black prayer has appeared. Dianlayer tries to lure him into the trap, but before he knows it, Linlan is in the hands of the Black Prayer.
Summaries.jpn: ∞9「緑の戦慄」浄化したはずの塔が復活し、黒祈士が現れた。ディアンレイヤーはトラップに誘い込もうとするが、いつの間にかリンランが黒祈士の手に…。

Summaries.eng: ∞10 "Purple sleeps" A black prayer appears in front of Remy. Rabian Layer challenges the battle like a game, but declares that he will fight seriously against the black prayer's unquestioned attack.
Summaries.jpn: ∞10「紫は眠る」レミィの前に黒祈士が出現。ゲーム感覚で戦いに挑むラビアンレイヤーだが、黒祈士の問答無用の攻撃に本気で戦うことを宣言して…。

Summaries.eng: ∞13 “Silver Screen Trap” Kos ∞ players who are struggling have fallen apart and cannot change layers. A movie director-like man appears there ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞13「銀幕の罠」苦戦中のコス∞プレイヤーは心がバラバラになり、レイヤーチェンジできなくなってしまった。そこに映画監督風の男が現れて…。

Summaries.eng: ∞ 14 "Dream Color Festival" (First Edition) Purifying the Tower of Darkness reveals a familiar building. What I've been up to now is my dream of becoming a TV program "The Cosmopolitan Kos ∞ Player" ...?
Summaries.jpn: ∞14「夢色の祭」（初号版）暗黒の塔を浄化すると、見覚えのある建物が出現。これまでのことはTV番組「超変身コス∞プレイヤー」になりきっていた自分の夢…？

Titles.jpn: 劇場版「超変身コス∞プレイヤー VS 暗黒宇宙将軍」

Summaries.eng: Theatrical version "The Cosmopolitan Kos ∞ Player VS Dark Space General" After sealing the evil god, Scarlet went on a journey. Now I just want to pray for Cruz. In Tokyo, Kos ∞ players were reunited for the first time in a year. Meanwhile, a huge space battleship suddenly broke through the ISO barrier and appeared. Their real aim was the power of Kos ∞ players ...
Summaries.jpn:
劇場版「超変身コス∞プレイヤー VS 暗黒宇宙将軍」
邪神封印後、スカーレットは旅に出た。今はただ、クルスのために祈りたいと。東京ではコス∞プレイヤーたちが一年ぶりに再会していた。そんな中、突如ISOの結界を突破して巨大宇宙戦艦が出現。奴らの本当の狙いはコス∞プレイヤーの巫力だった…。

Summaries.eng: ∞1 "Akai Shogeki" Koto Hoshino, a high school girl, accidentally picked up a cosmo breath at Izumo, a school trip destination. The ancient city, wearing a breath as if guided by someone, climbs up an ancient temple ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞1「赤の衝撃」女子高生の星野古都は、修学旅行先の出雲で偶然コスモブレスを拾った。何者かに導かれるかのようにブレスを身につけた古都は古代の神殿を昇っていくのだが…。

Summaries.eng: ∞2 "Resurrection of Black" When the ancient city woke up, people other than them disappeared. Meanwhile, Tagitsuhime, the daughter of the sun god Amaterasu, appears ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞2「黒の復活」古都が目を覚ますと、彼女たち以外の人々は消えていた。そんな中、太陽神アマテラスの娘、タキツヒメが姿を現して…。

Summaries.eng: ∞3 "Purple Light Bullet" Scarlet was entrusted by Cruz to make the ancient city a full-fledged Koss ∞ player. She gave a special training on a tennis ball attack to the ancient city using the power of a shrine.
Summaries.jpn: ∞3「紫の光弾」クルスから古都を一人前のコス∞プレイヤーにすることを託されたスカーレット。彼女は古都に巫力を使ったテニスボール攻撃の特訓を行い…。

Summaries.eng: ∞4 "Green Brain" The transformation of the ancient city was only an incomplete "intermediate form". Scarlet pushes the ancient city to the limit and tries to bring out its awakening.
Summaries.jpn: ∞4「緑の頭脳」古都が変身したのは、不完全な「中間形態」にすぎなかった。スカーレットは古都を極限状態に追い込み、その覚醒を引き出そうとするが…。

Summaries.eng: ∞7 "Yellow Explosion" A sari layer that has become a pinch due to a momentary gap. Inusuke tries to help, but on the contrary, he is made a dog quality ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞7「黄の爆発」一瞬のスキをつかれてピンチになってしまったサリーレイヤー。犬助が助けようとするものの、逆に犬質にされてしまい…。

Summaries.eng: ∞8 "Light blue tears" The ancient cities that arrived in Nagoya. I remember that the ancient city visited this place every year. In such an ancient city, Scarlet coldly tells us to throw away the crappy sentiment ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞8「水色の涙」名古屋に着いた古都たち。古都は毎年この地を訪れていたことを思い出す。そんな古都に、スカーレットはくだらない感傷は捨てるよう、冷たく言い放ち…。

Summaries.eng: ∞11 "Yellow Crisis" Sally layer who challenges the black prayer. However, Prisila, whose shield has been defeated, is imprisoned in prison with Iko and Remy who have been captured.
Summaries.jpn: ∞11「黄の危機」黒祈士に挑むサリーレイヤー。だが、シールドを打ち破られたプリシラは捕らえられていたイコやレミィと牢獄に監禁されてしまい…。

Summaries.eng: ∞12 “Five colors again” A costume ∞ player who has released three people and has five people. When the five strong feelings of "defeating the Black Prayer!" Became one, a layer field appeared ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞12「五色再び」三人を解放し、五人そろったコス∞プレイヤー。「黒祈士を倒す！」という五人の強い想いが一つになった時、レイヤーフィールドが出現して…。

Summaries.eng: ∞15 "Impact of jet black" Cruz's voice was heard in the ancient city. I don't know why it was heard only in the ancient city, but the five headed to the dark tower in Yokohama where they could hear it ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞15「漆黒の衝撃」古都にクルスの声が聞こえてきた。なぜ古都にだけ聞こえたのか不明だが、五人は聞き取ることのできた横浜にある暗黒の塔へ向かい…。

Summaries.eng: ∞ 16 "Gray Truth" Five people who heard the story of "Goddess in white clothes" from an old man. They are prepared for danger, but when they change layers as instructed ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞16「灰色の真実」老人から「白き衣をまといし女神」の話を聞いた五人。彼女たちは、危険を覚悟しつつも指示されたとおりにレイヤーチェンジすると…。

Summaries.eng: ∞17 "Crimson loneliness" This world is a temporary barrier to seal the woman of the evil god Ta. That's why Cruz says he must perform the ritual to complete the seal this time. An ancient city where you can't believe his words ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞17「真紅の孤独」この世界は、邪神タの女を封じるための仮の結界。だから今度こそ封印完成の儀式を行わねばならないと言うクルス。そんな彼の言葉が信じられない古都は…。

Summaries.eng: ∞18 "Shirogin no Kudo" Miko is dizzy by the mark of the black shrine maiden. However, seeing Tagitsuhime's desperate appearance, she wields a sword at the black shrine maiden with all her strength.
Summaries.jpn: ∞18「白銀の蠢動」ミコは黒巫女の印により、眩暈に襲われる。だが、タキツヒメの必死な姿を見て、渾身の力で黒巫女に剣を振るい…。

Summaries.eng: ∞ 19 "Pale White Decision" Miko arrives at the last dark tower. The black shrine maiden attacks such Miko with all her might. Tagitsuhime encourages Miko, whose courage is about to break, with her clear eyes.
Summaries.jpn: ∞19「蒼白の決断」最後の暗黒の塔に辿り着いたミコ。そんなミコを黒巫女は全力で攻撃する。勇気が挫けかけるミコを、タキツヒメが澄み切った瞳で励まして…。

Summaries.eng: ∞20 "Brown Battlefield" Tagitsuhime appears and tells the truth to everyone who is confused. And Cruz says that they will become a pillar and prevent the resurrection of the Ta woman ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞20「褐色の戦場」困惑する一同に、タキツヒメが現れて真実を語る。そしてクルスは、自分たちが人柱となってタの女の復活を阻止すると言い出し…。

Summaries.eng: ∞21 "The Will of Guren" The hearts of the five people came together, and a huge white goddess descended. The White Goddess receives the united Prince Kurono's sword and smashes it.
Summaries.jpn: ∞21「紅蓮の遺言」五人の心がまとまり、巨大な白き女神が降臨した。白き女神は合体した黒之皇子の剣を受け止め、たたき折るが…。

Summaries.eng: ∞22 "The Maiden in a White Coat" Miko remembers the battle with Himika in a black shrine maiden, and realizes that Tagitsuhime (Ta's woman) hated the tune born from the sword. When Miko hums the melody ...
Summaries.jpn: ∞22「白衣の乙女」ミコは黒巫女姿の日見香との戦いを思い出し、剣から生まれた旋律をタキツヒメ（タの女）が嫌っていたことに気づく。そのメロディをミコが口ずさむと…。
